column4: hi guys does anyone know a decent tutorial to install window live messenger , dont sya use pidgin etc

heh ok uhmmmm
that's one of the worst programs ever :)   ,but it really does help to lock stupid people into Windows.  Linux has  some good alternatives though
yes there is Pidgin and Kopete multi protocall network,  but you will find they lack your stupid MSN features
however  there is also AMSN and Kmess
AMSN has web cam suppourt etc etc.   Kmess is nice as well
how old are you?
how old are you?
oh  thought you would be a bit younger
I mean it's stupid people that are locked into  WIndows LIve Messenger mainly.  however if you really must have it in Ubuntu, there is a way
however the only way your going to get WIndows LIve Messenger is by running Windows inside Ubuntu
I belive Wine and all that will fail with it
no there is not
live messenger to then itunes?  there are itunes alternatives
i no and the itunes alternatives are fine
if you want certain Windows shit such as WIndows Live Messenger and Itunes,  your going to  need to run them in Windows.  or if it's an Itunes you could run it on a Mac of course
if you must have WIndows Live Messenger,  then you will need Windows for it, it's as simple as that
no its not that kind of attitude will never progress an os

do you think Microsoft care about making  Desktop Linux popular or any other OS?  of course not, hence why they make sure that later versions of WIndows LIve Messenger only work  properly  on  Windows
it's amazing the amount of  ignorant computer users,  that rely so much on Windows Live Messenger, even though the alternatives are pretty good as well
